Any suggestion on web developers who can create websites and landing pages on daily basis. We are lot of landing pages and websites pending due to shortage of staff.
Key knowledge of php, html,3d designs, photoshop.
Anyone who can do join in-house or freelancer or company then please contact me Tuesday.
There is deadline of project which should be meet up and client satisfaction is necessary in work done.
There is developer screening and interview by operations before final selection.
P.S. Please connect to me at tuesday. I am not available till Monday.
Many SDRs I talk too feel downtrodden and disrespected. They may be starting off their career completely or attempting to get a start in the tech world and should be commended for this brave step.

It is not easy to spend 8 hours a day calling or emailing people who do not want to be bothered. SDRs are in fact the soldiers on the front lines and strategists who are looking for insights as to how the market is moving should be talking to their SDRs daily.
It also disappoints me when we look at people based on title and not ability. Many promotions are not earned as a function of raw ability but are simply a manifestation of time spent at the company.

The great thing about sales is you can earn the right to be promoted simply through hard work and results alone; therefore an SDR who performs well and soars through the ranks commands more of my respect than someone who has just sat in a chair for longer.

I have also talked about how we should treat SDRs who prospect into executives. I think a major undoing in the industry right now is sales development/marketing leadership who use mass sending tools under the names of their reps without the right degree of caution. This fosters malcontent and is not strategic to elevating the profession.
Founding Member & President of the Phoenix Chapter, Creative Director & Community Platform Leader

The Sales Enablement Society was started when 16 leaders from marketing and sales backgrounds met in Tysons Corner, VA (Washington DC Area) in February of 2016. Since then our group has evolved rapidly from a series of meet ups to a volunteer organization dedicated to promoting and elevating sales enablement as a strategic function. We are defining, debating, and taking firm positions about the sales enablement function in order to establish standards for our rapidly emerging profession. Get involved by joining the conversation on our Linkedin Group; sign up on our site as a member (free); or email us directly at SESocietyPHX@gmail.com. Registered 501c non-profit. All volunteer led, 2500+ members, 30+ cities, & 4 continents as of November 2017.I designed and led the platform team to create our community platform for sharing and connecting with other practitioners. Check it out at www.sesociety.org and let me know your thoughts!

Established in 2002, the Arizona Technology Council is a private, not-for-profit trade association founded to connect, represent and support the state's expanding technology industry. To promote economic growth and professional development in Arizona's technology sector, the Council provides members networking opportunities, business support and access to educational forums. The Council strives to distinguish Arizona as a leader in the technology community and offer resources that are exclusive to its members.As an Ambassador for the AZTC, I welcome new members to the council and ensure they get the most out of their membership. Sometimes this means introducing them to other members, other times this means helping them understand all of the benefits of joining the council. Regardless, I am a people-person and love helping where I can! The mission of the Ambassador Committee in Phoenix is to build an exceptional community, advocate for a strong business climate and provide value to Arizona Technology Council members. Ambassadors serve the Council and its members by striving to improve the level of personal customer service.

I was given the incredible opportunity to work very closely with Lucas during our tenure on the rocket ship that was Zenefits. Lucas was always more than willing to carve time out of his day to make himself a valuable resource to any of his peers and was a direct contribution to my own personal success. His long standing background in SaaS, Sales and Tech has shaped Lucas into an impeccable resource that any organization would be more than lucky to have on their side.

It is with great pleasure that I write this brief note of recommendation for Lucas Gerler. I have known Lucas since he started with CareerBuilder, where he was, not surprisingly, promoted quickly through the ranks to his current position.  Mr. Gerler's seemingly innate intelligence for sales and consultation is among the best I have seen. He has the skills and energy necessary to see complex projects through to completion, guiding support teams and clients through a complex lifecycle process, on time and within budget. He is a team player and a natural leader, a dynamic professional who wins the respect of others through his unwavering desire to deliver the best for his clients and his exceptional charisma.  I can confidently recommend Lucas for any level position in sales and/or new business development.  If I may provide you with any further information to support your consideration of Mr. Lucas Gerler, please feel free to contact me.

August 29, 2016, Lucas managed Ross directly

They say "birds of a feather flock together", so it should have come as no surprise when I was introduced through a mutual friend/past-colleague to Ross; that we immediately hit it off.  Ross has a natural curiosity in life coupled with a thirst for learning which pushes him to actively seek out new and challenging opportunities for growth. He is a great listener and always seeks to make both parties involved in a conversation feel at ease with the situation. His dedication to his family (both human and fur family alike) is a reflection of his core midwest-values. In the short time we have been working together, I have seen Ross dive head-first into both a position and an industry which are new to him, and he has flourished! Taking in everything and learning from his peers while also adding his voice to the direction of the company, Ross was the first BDR hired at Allbound for good reason! I anticipate that Ross will continue to grow into a SaaS sales superstar over the coming years and can't wait to watch his continued growth and success!

Zach is one-in-a-million. His well-rounded business acumen allows him to speak with expertise and confidence to both those in the C-suite as well as mid-level managers. Zach and I worked together on targeting revenue-generating MM and ENT accounts for Zenefits.  Zach's ability to understand the nuances of the high-value, high-impact sales process combined with his thirst for learning made him my most valuable team member. Zach will do well in any organization that has a complex sales process and a complex product. He has the ability to be an individual contributor carrying a quota and also has the skill-set to add value as a sales engineer. I wholeheartedly recommend Zach for any business that is looking to bring on a proven sales executive.

summary: I am a highly seasoned SaaS sales and marketing professional with a focus on creating life-long and mutually-beneficial partnerships.  I excel at 'seeing the big picture' and bringing innovative ideas to life. I am a concerned global citizen, a lifelong student, and an impact maker always looking for a challenge (and new partners!).My PASSION lies in helping people and companies thrive -Not just stay alive. Innovation is the name of the game and I pride myself on being at the forefront of emerging technologies in the SaaS marketplace. For well over a decade, I have consulted with CEOs, business owners, VPs of Marketing & Sales and the like; working collaboratively with them on crafting and implementing innovate marketing solutions to the challenges of doing business in the 'new world' with the "new buyer".People I want to connect with include:* the movers and shakers of the world and those also "on a mission" to disrupt the status quo in sales and marketing * Trusted advisers, marketing consultants, agencies * Sales and Marketing leaders in Hi-tech, IT, Healthcare, retail and manufacturing * Speakers, inspirational authors, professors, intellectuals, misfits, other outsidersCore Expertise & Functional Experience ‚Ä¶anything iOT or cloud-based, all sales and marketing technology, anything and everything automation, sales effectiveness, sales enablement, video in the sales process, complex software systems, workflow automation, Infusionsoft & Hubspot certified consultant, networking, social media marketing. If we have only recently connected, I invite you to interact with me here as well as other social channels, so that we may get to know each other better.
